bio.1: I’m Dania Alnahdi, a Boston-based software developer from Bahrain with a focus on design and product. I’m passionate about solving user experience challenges, researching innovative and human-centered solutions, and building interactive (and pretty!) user interfaces.
bio.2: In my free time, I enjoy discovering new plant-based food joints, exploring entrepreneurial endeavors, or getting lost in a good book.

project1.name: Cubby
project1.description: A learning management system for young students designed for social-emotional learning.

project2.name: Saltwater Classroom
project2.description: An educational and social platform on ocean conservation for nonprofit Saltwater Classroom.

project3.name: OneASICS
project3.description: During my ASICS Digital co-op, I worked on OneASICS: the authentication portal used across ASICS' fitness and e-commerce apps. My main task was updating the registration's interface and error handling logic, decreasing user errors by 37%.

project4.name: Build for Black Lives
project4.description: An online platform that connects Black businesses and organizations to developers and creatives offering pro bono services. I was able to kickstart and collaborate on this initiative as an organizer for HackBeanpot!

project5.name: Eco Eateries
project5.description: This winning hackathon project is a goal-tracker for restaurants to adopt sustainable business practices. As the only frontend developer on the team, I was in charge of building the user interface, which included an interactive Kanban board.

project6.name: Security Council Database
project6.description: After building a database of United Nations data with my team, I expanded on the project by designing an API and coding and deploying a full-stack online directory, in line with our goal to make information on global issues more accessible.

project7.name: Alumni Data Visualizations
project7.description: In my service-learning course, I led the development of information visualizations for the Massachusetts Promise Fellowship, an AmeriCorps organization. The interactive graphs are connected via two-way brushing and linking for advanced filtering.

project8.name: Personal Website
project8.description: This very website! My goal was to create a responsive website from scratch using modern JavaScript tooling. I also added my own illustrations for a more personalized feel.

contact.heading: Say hi!
